overview: Sara Johnson is a closeted queer girl whose unable to come to terms with the recent death of her best friend turned secret girlfriend, Lucy Bloom. Now, on the day of the funeral, Sara tries desperately to find the missing journal that belongs to her dead girlfriend while enduring painful memories, PTSD, and discouraging encounters with Lucyâ€™s homophobic mother, Sharon, whose hellbent of erasing Sara from her daughters name.
title: Permanent Ink
